name: mathesar
description: Mathesar is a web-based data management and visualization tool built on PostgreSQL. It lets users explore, edit, and collaborate on database tables without technical expertise, ideal for small organizations.

features.title: Visual Database Interface
features.description: Browse and edit PostgreSQL tables through an intuitive spreadsheet-like UI

features.title: No
features.description: Build complex database queries using visual filters and joins without writing SQL

features.title: Data Types
features.description: Support for all PostgreSQL data types with appropriate input controls and validation

features.title: Relationship Mapping
features.description: Visualize and navigate foreign key relationships between tables

features.title: Collaborative Editing
features.description: Multiple users can view and edit data simultaneously with conflict resolution

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Load data from CSV, Excel, or JSON files and export in various formats

features.title: Custom Views
features.description: Create saved views with specific filters, sorts, and column selections

features.title: Data Validation
features.description: Set constraints and validation rules to maintain data quality and integrity
